title: How to Delete a Friend Request on Facebook: Mobile & Desktop

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. It's a blue app with a white f . If you're not automatically logged in , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the lower-right corner (iOS) or top-right corner (Android).

steps.title: Tap Friends.
steps.content: Tap Friends . It's the tile with two people.

steps.title: Tap Friend requests at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Tap Friend requests at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap ••• .
steps.content: Tap ••• . This is at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap View sent request.
steps.content: Tap View sent request . You can find this at the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Undo (iPhone) or CANCEL (Android).
steps.content: Tap Undo (iPhone) or CANCEL (Android). This will be to the person you sent the request to. The friend request will be canceled.

steps.title: Delete a friend request (optional).
steps.content: Delete a friend request (optional). If you want to delete a friend request that was sent to you instead, do the following: Tap ☰ . Tap Friends . Tap Delete next to the request. If you get a lot of unwanted requests from the same person, you can also block them .

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com in a web browser. If you're not already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Click the two-people icon.
steps.content: Click the two-people icon. This is the Friends tab. You can find this at the top of your feed.

steps.title: Click Friend Requests.
steps.content: Click Friend Requests . You can find this in the left panel.

steps.title: Click View sent requests.
steps.content: Click View sent requests . This will be underneath the Friend Requests header.

steps.title: Click on Cancel Request.
steps.content: Click on Cancel Request . You'll see this next to the person you sent the request to. The friend request will be canceled. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Delete a friend request (optional).
steps.content: Delete a friend request (optional). If you want to delete a friend request that was sent to you instead, do the following: Click the two-person icon on your home page. Click Friend Requests . Click Delete or Delete Request . [2] X Research source
